useCase.name: Access Image Descriptive Information
useCase.description: Access information about an image stored in the system.

preconditions.precondition: The user has access to the website.

successEndConditions.condition: The user successfully views the descriptive information of the image.

failureEndConditions.condition: The system encounters errors while retrieving the image information.

mainSequence.step: User Interface receives request for access.
Donor Respresentative requests descriptive info about an image.
File Management queries the Database to fetch image metadata.
Database returns the image metadata to File Management.
File Management displays the descriptive info about the image.
User Intestate shows the descriptive info about the image to Donor Respresentative.
